title: How to Install GamePigeon & Play Gomoku in the iPhone Messages App

steps.title: Open Messages.
steps.content: Open Messages. There are a number of games you can play in iMessage , including Gomoku. However, to play Gomoku in your Messages app, you must have iMessage enabled and you must be playing with someone who has an Apple device with iMessage enabled. To enable iMessage , go to your Settings app, scroll down to Messages and toggle on iMessage .

steps.title: Open or create a message with a contact.
steps.content: Open or create a message with a contact. Make sure this contact has an Apple device. You may want to remind them to turn on iMessage .

steps.title: Tap the icon with an "A" next to the text box.
steps.content: Tap the icon with an "A" next to the text box. This will open the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the blue App Store icon.
steps.content: Tap the blue App Store icon. This will open the App Store in your Messages app, allowing you to install various apps that you can use in iMessage.

steps.title: Search for GamePigeon.
steps.content: Search for GamePigeon. GamePigeon is an iMessage app that allows you to play a number of games with friends, including Gomoku. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Get icon next to GamePigeon.
steps.content: Tap the Get icon next to GamePigeon. This will install the app.

steps.title: Return to Messages and tap the GamePigeon icon in the app drawer.
steps.content: Return to Messages and tap the GamePigeon icon in the app drawer. GamePigeon will open and you can select the game you want to play.

steps.title: Understand the rules.
steps.content: Understand the rules. In the GamePigeon version of Gomoku, you win by placing 5 of your markers (or stones) in a row before your opponent can. During each turn, you can place one of your stones on the board, then play passes to the next player.

steps.title: Select Gomoku in GamePigeon.
steps.content: Select Gomoku in GamePigeon. This will add an invitation to play Gomoku to a new message. You can add additional text, if you prefer. Once you're ready to send the invitation, tap the Send button.

steps.title: Wait for your friend to accept the game invitation.
steps.content: Wait for your friend to accept the game invitation. If you go into your Gomoku game in GamePigeon, you'll see a notice that says "Waiting for opponent." You must wait for your friend to accept the invitation before you can make a move. Once your friend accepts the invitation, the player with the black markers will go first. If you're black markers, you can make your move as soon as your friend accepts the invite. If you have white markers, you'll have to wait for your friend to go first.

steps.title: Place your stone on the board.
steps.content: Place your stone on the board. During their turn, each player can place one stone on the board. The goal is to place 5 stones in a consecutive row, be it vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.

steps.title: Send your move.
steps.content: Send your move. Once your friend completes their move, you can play again. Remember to try and block your friend from placing stones in a row to keep them from winning. Keep sending moves back and forth until someone wins.
